info.title: MonitoringWorker API
info.description: API for managing monitoring worker and endpoints

post.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

get.summary: Checks if the current user has a specific permission

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of changes to return

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: Name of the connection to test

get.summary: Executes monitoring queries for a specific connection

post.summary: Executes a custom SQL query for monitoring

get.summary: Gets monitoring results with filtering and pagination

post.summary: Trigger manual monitoring check for all endpoints
Trigger manual monitoring check for a specific endpoint

get.summary: Get all feature toggles and their status
Check if a specific feature is enabled

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: Name of the feature to check

get.summary: Get configuration summary for dashboard display

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to pause

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to resume

performanceThresholdMs.description: Performance alert threshold (95th percentile in milliseconds)

refreshIntervalSeconds.description: Auto-refresh interval for dashboards in seconds

enabled.description: Whether this connection is enabled for monitoring

queryNames.description: Queries to run for this specific connection

DatabaseConnectionDto.description: Database connection DTO (excludes sensitive connection string)

maxConcurrentConnections.description: Maximum number of concurrent database connections

expectedValue.description: Expected value for health check queries

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison operator for expected value (Equals, GreaterThan, LessThan, etc.)

timeoutSeconds.description: Query timeout in seconds (overrides connection default)
Timeout in seconds for this specific endpoint (optional)

method.description: HTTP method to use for the check (default: GET)

expectedStatusCodes.description: Expected HTTP status codes that indicate success

headers.description: Additional headers to send with the request

enableBasicMetrics.description: Enable basic application metrics (jobs, health checks)

enabled.description: Enable or disable all monitoring features

defaultTimeoutSeconds.description: Default timeout in seconds for HTTP requests

MonitoringOptions.description: Configuration options for the monitoring service

checkName.description: The name of the check that was performed

message.description: A human-readable message describing the result

details.description: Additional details about the check result

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the check was performed

durationMs.description: The duration of the check in milliseconds

MonitoringResult.description: Represents the result of a monitoring check

MonitoringStatus.description: Represents the status of a monitoring check

cronSchedule.description: Cron expression for scheduling monitoring jobs

waitForJobsToComplete.description: Whether to wait for jobs to complete on shutdown

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
